_sText:
- Single-stage map 
- Alternative way
- Playable characters and pickable items
- Music from Hobbit Movie OST
- Secret Easter Eggs ( Gollum and The Ring )

**Characters**

- LEGOLAS 
- SARUMAN
- GOBLIN  
- GOBLIN (second skin)
- ORC : speed and charge
- WITCH KING 

**Items**

- SHIELD
- MAUL
- SWORD
- BILBO BLADE
- GANDALF STAFF
- RING (invisibility)
- OTHERS : ladder, torch, cannon...

This is an alpha version but perfectly playable. 

The map WILL NOT be updated cause of problems IRL. If you want to fix bugs/optimize it, send me an email at : captainjackcss@gmail.com 

Thank You !
